column6: This Alexa sample skill is a template for a basic fact skill. Provided a list of interesting facts about a topic, Alexa will select a fact at random and tell it to the user when the skill is invoked.

This Alexa sample skill is a template for a trivia style game with score keeping. Alexa will ask you a multiple choice questions and seek your response. Correct and Incorrect answers to questions are recorded.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS MySQL using the single user rotation scheme
Create a parameter-based skill using a template called ‘Minecraft Helper’. Ask how to craft an item in the game Minecraft, and this skill will give you instructions.
A starter hello-world serverless application
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS PostgreSQL using single user rotation scheme
Demonstrates a basic skill built with the Amazon Alexa Skills Kit.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS MySQL using the multiple user rotation scheme
A simple backend (read/write to DynamoDB) with a RESTful API endpoint using Amazon API Gateway.

This serverless application deploys a Lambda function and API Gateway to your AWS account that reads images from a S3 bucket (whose name defined at deployment) and serves them through API Gateway with original or desired dimensions.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS PostgreSQL using the multiple user rotation scheme
The Datadog RDS enhanced monitoring application collects granular operating system level metrics from CloudWatch logs and sends them to Datadog for alerting, dashboarding, and analyzing.
Demonstrates a basic skill built with the Amazon Alexa Skills Kit.
Provides the basic framework for a skill adapter for a smart home skill.
A started hello-world serverless application in python3

A Lambda@Edge function that implements standard web server redirects that simplify directory handling. It handles "internal" redirects from /foo/ to /foo/index.html and "external" redirects from /foo/index.html to /foo/.
An example AWS Lambda function to index records from DynamoDB to ElasticSearch.
Serverless web application for uploading files to S3

This is an serverless component consisting of a Lambda function, API Gateway and a DynamoDB table. Its API Gateway receives request data, sends it to your Lambda function which saves request data to a DynamoDB table. Supports CORS. Written in Node.js.
This is a dynamic s3 website which uses API gateway and Lambda to scan a Dynamodb Table and displays in tabular format.
Demonstrates using a built-in Node.js module to make an HTTPS request.
Example of sending metrics from NodeJs Lambda using SignalFx Wrapper to SignalFx in real-time.
Creates a templated lambda to be used by AWS SecretsManager for secret rotation
An Amazon S3 trigger that retrieves metadata for the object that has been updated.
Sample application for generating a response from viewer-request trigger implemented in NodeJS.
A simple mobile backend (read/write to DynamoDB).
React TodoMVC with a Serverless backend
A starter hello-world serverless application in python

Selenium on PhantomJS. In fact - a ready-made tool for web scraping. For example, the demo parses a random page in Wikipedia and sends its header. (PhantomJS at the same time disguises as a normal browser, knows how to log in, click and fill out forms)
Uses ImageMagick to perform simple image processing operations, such as resizing.

Thanks to this application, you will be to quickly generate your own serverless survey. Just fill out configuration file with questions which should be part of the survey and save your app. In just a few seconds, your survey will be available!

Need a "contact us" form on your static website?  

This template uses API Gateway, Lambda, and SNS to create a Serverless "contact us" form for your static website.
A sample hello world Lambda application written in Go, using eawsy/aws-lambda-go-shim.
A getting started application to deploy an API with API Gateway and a Lambda written in Go.
This component creates an API Gateway endpoint that is linked to a Lambda function that returns HTML (i.e. page can be viewed in a web browser)
Periodically polls an SQS queue and asynchronously consumes each message.
A sample application for API Gateway custom authorizers, implemented in NodeJS.
Used in episode 3 of "Alexa Devs" - a series to learn how to develop alexa skills
The Datadog log forwarder ships logs stored in S3 and CloudWatch Logs to Datadog for live search, analytics, and alerting.
Alexa responds with the count and anagrams for a requested word
An Amazon SNS trigger that logs the message pushed to the SNS topic.
Post notifications to Slack when Code Pipeline Events occur
Run new and existing Selenium Webdriver scripts written in Javascript with the headless chromium browser.
Tesseract is OCR recognition library which allows to get text from given image.
Generate thumbnails for images uploaded to S3
Serverless application that sends CloudWatch alarm notifications to Slack on an Amazon SNS trigger

This is a S3 Lambda that listens to an event when a file is stored in a S3 Bucket. It then saves information about the stored file in a DynamoDB table.
Written in Node.js. It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.

Authenticate your users through Cognito, Lambda and API Gateway. The script will set a local cookie in the browser and prompt for reauthentication by the user if needed. 

More information; https://github.com/marekq/serverless-cognito

This sample Alexa skill demonstrates how to build an Alexa private skill that integrates with your Salesforce data, utilizing account linking and a personal voice code. Once you've linked an account, you can find and modify your sales opportunities.
A simple backend (read/write to DynamoDB) with a RESTful API endpoint using Amazon API Gateway.
A simple backend (read/write to DynamoDB) with a RESTful API endpoint using Amazon API Gateway.

An Amazon S3 trigger that retrieves metadata for the object that has been updated.

You can play games with two players via different browsers.
It uses that the temporary data is held within the time-out period.
Collect and store crypto currency prices of the top 200 coins according to market cap. Alert yourself if one of your coins is changing price significantly.

The AWS Serverless application package contains a set of common Lambda functions to be used by Amazon Connect to interact with Salesforce, allowing lookup, create and update operations for different Salesforce objects, like Contacts and Cases.
This serverless app periodically polls a given SQS queue and invokes a given lambda function to process messages.

Send log data from CloudWatch Logs and S3 to New Relic Infrastructure - Cloud Integrations.

Create a static website with CloudFormation and SAM with S3.

This template create a bucket and bucket with www to redirect to the master bucket.

Train and run a Machine Learning model to predict the quality of your red wine. This app aims at showcasing how to train a regression model with Scikit Learn on Lambda, and then use the model to do predictions still on Lambda.

Written in Node.js. It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.
Serverless Magic 8-Ball is serverless version of fortune-telling / seeking advice toy. If you will deploy it, you will never have problem to quickly make a live changing decision!

This is a Lambda function that receives an API Gateway request and retrieves (gets) one item from a DynamoDB table. 

Supports CORS. Written in Node.js. 

It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.
This sample demonstrates the use of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB and API Gateway to implement a simple contact us form for a static web site.
An Amazon DynamoDB trigger that logs the updates made to a table.
The Datadog VPC flow log application captures flow log data from CloudWatch logs, parses out metrics and tags, ands sends it to Datadog for alerting, dashboarding, and analyzing.

App that can recognize who is on the photo! Create a collection by uploading photos of people you want to recognize and then use the web-app to check who is on the picture (you can use your mobile phone's camera!)
Send a link to a random dog picture to a phone number daily, via AWS Lambda and SNS.
This serverless app turns a twitter search query into an AWS Lambda event source by invoking a given lambda function to process tweets found by search.

Demonstrates basic handling of a Slack slash command by responding to questions from users.  Sets up a new '/Hodor' Slack Slash Command:

/Hodor what is the meaning of life?

After deployment, CloudWatch Events is set.
Please set IAM police.
Triggered by an AWS SNS notification that their IP blocks have been updated, this function will automatically update your Security Groups with specific tags.

This skill demonstrates how to build a private Alexa skill to access Salesforce data. This skill identifies a given opportunity, tracks a series of statements that a user gives, and posts those either as a note or as a Chatter post.

This is a Lambda function that charges a Stripe account based on the API Gateway request data. 
Supports CORS. Written in Node.js.
It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.
PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, EPUB generator. Enables to create/modify custom microsoft office documents + PDFs and books. Example code in the repo generates example of each of the document mentioned.
This solution creates resources for processing and sending Amazon GuardDuty Events to Sumo logic.

Sample application for generating a redirect response based on the viewer country. Triggered by an origin-request. Implemented in NodeJS.
Package for fans of statistics, data scientists and data engineers. RAM at lambda is 1.5 gigabytes, and the maximum operating time - 5 minutes. I am sure that will be enough for most tasks.

Analyzes sentiment of tweets returned from the Twitter Event Source serverless application and publishes them as metrics to CloudWatch Metrics.

Open source library for Machine Intelligence. Using tensorflow on lambda is not as bad as it may sound - for some simple models it is the simplest and the cheapest way to deploy.

my-ip-today is a Lambda@Edge service that returns the client IP address directly. This is a simple demo with the CloudFront and Lambda@Edge.

A serverless API that converts CloudFormation templates between JSON and YAML formats.

A simple Lambda function that forwards your CloudWatch logs to the Timber.io logging service. Timber.io is a modern logging service with extremely fast search. If you haven't already, give it a try at https://timber.io.

Blueprint for generating and manipulating graphics using node-canvas, a Cairo backed Canvas implementation for NodeJS by Automattic.

Create a serverless podcast service using Amazon S3 for storage of music files and Lambda for generation of the podcast feed. The Lambda function can run periodically to add/remove podcast files from the S3 bucket containing your music.
Publish a Slack API chat.postMessage message received from SNS to Slack.  Combine this with a new application to start posting messages from that application to Slack.

Packer Cleaner will automatically detect long running Packer-created instances. Default behaviour is that it will send notifications about this to a created SNS topic, but it can be configured to automatically stop or terminate instances as well.

This service provides a bridge between AWS IoT and Twilio for your devices to send messages to Twillio.

Lambda pack for load testing APIs and websites. Contains WRK (https://github.com/wg/wrk) and pyresttest (https://github.com/svanoort/pyresttest) libraries. WRK is useful for producing high loads. Pyresttest is useful for API workflow testing.

Run any algorithm in the Algorithmia marketplace.

This AWS Serverless Application crawls the NYC Parks's Events website (https://www.nycgovparks.org/events/) and generates a scoped view of the data listed there and stores it in an Amazon DynamoDB Table.

Convert a Twitter tweet into a Slack API chat.postMessage message. This nanoservice is intended to be used with other SAR nanonservices in order to construct a functional application. See the README for one example.

column6: Creates an API endpoint with Lambda integration which accepts a .txt file and returns an object with word counts

Error tracking in the cloud. Free and opensource, tightly integrated with AWS. Capture client-side errors and exceptions, save to S3 for later analysis with Athena, query using ElasticSearch, publish to CloudWatch metrics for easy alerts and notifications.
A serverless app that simply receives and logs events.
An AWS Lambda function that indexes images uploaded to a S3 bucket based on labels detected by Amazon Rekognition.

An experimental mock implementation of a OAUTH2 Shared Component implemented as a Serverless Application to proxy activation/authentication requests for non SaaS multi-tenant 3rd party partner applications.
Sends logs from Cloudwatch logs to Loggly using a Lambda function.

Welcome to Amazon Connect Serverless Hook for Contextual Messages

The sample code helps get you started with a simple web service integration hook deployed by AWS CloudFormation between Amazon Connect and AWS Lambda with Dynamo DB.

Unwraps compressed input artifact(s) and deploys the files to a S3 bucket with mime types. It attempts to only deploy modified files by checking S3 object Etag against md5 hash of the data. You can optionally invalidate CloudFront after deployment.

nephridium addresses the use case where a dynamically filtered Socrata dataset is desired over time. You specify the Sorata dataset, tell nephridium what the date attribute is and you get an HTML table of the data!
DataDome detects non-human traffic, identifies and categorizes bot operators in real time, and helps you turn them into new business opportunities.

Guarana is a SAM packaged webhook debugging tool, it captures HTTP requests and saves them kindly to S3 to help you review/debug them later.
